title: Post-login splash screen: icon-only UI and show on every authenticated app open

requirements.summary: Make the post-login splash/intro screen render only the animated gallery icon with no welcome/title text.
acceptanceCriteria: When the splash screen is visible, no welcome/title text is shown anywhere on the splash screen.
The animated gallery icon remains visible and centered on the splash screen.

file_operations.description: Remove the heading/welcome text and adjust layout so the splash displays only the centered AnimatedGalleryIcon animation while preserving existing timing/transition behavior.

requirements.summary: Show the splash once per app load whenever an authenticated session/delegation already exists, without affecting the unauthenticated welcome/login flow.
acceptanceCriteria: If the user is already authenticated and reloads/opens the app, the splash screen appears once before the Home page renders.
If the user is not authenticated, the app does not show this post-login splash and instead shows the unauthenticated welcome/login screen flow.
Within a single app load, the splash screen does not reappear again after it completes unless the page is reloaded/reopened or the user logs out and authenticates again.

file_operations.description: Update AppContent splash-triggering logic to show IntroScreen once after Internet Identity finishes initializing whenever identity is present (including identities restored from an existing session), and reset the "shown" flag on logout so it can show again on the next login; keep changes confined to existing splash/intro behavior.
